title: Understanding Transcultural Nursing
text: Transcultural nursing is a practice that focuses on understanding and respecting cultural differences in healthcare settings. It aims to provide care that is culturally sensitive and appropriate.

title: Key Aspects of Transcultural Nursing
text: Consider how cultural beliefs and practices can influence a person's health and healthcare decisions. Transcultural nursing involves integrating these beliefs into care plans.

hintAnswer: A practice which incorporates cultural beliefs and practices of individuals to help them maintain and regain health or to face death in a meaningful way
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes transcultural nursing?
choices: a respect for the client’s culture and openness to their beliefs and experiences
process where the client and nurse seek a mutually acceptable way to deal with competing interests of nursing care, prescribed medical care, and the client’s cultural needs
what the client Considers to be a problem, the Cause of the problem, how they are Coping with the problem, and how Concerned they are about the problem
A practice which incorporates cultural beliefs and practices of individuals to help them maintain and regain health or to face death in a meaningful way
